mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, SALT, ROLE, PICTURE, ENABLE, TO_CHAR(last_login_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_login_dt, user_time_zone, date_time_formatter, create_id, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(create_time, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_time, update_id, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(update_time, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS update_time FROM ZTHM_USER ORDER BY update_time, create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZTHM_USER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ROLE, PICTURE, SALT, ENABLE, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, #{picture}, #{salt}, #{isEnable}, #{createId}, to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{updateId}, to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'))
mapper.delete: UPDATE ZTHM_USER SET ENABLE ='N', update_time = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE username = #{username}
